abstract: Cablevision and Communications Workers of America reach two-year contract agreement that provides significant pay raise to company's technicians and brings three-year standoff to close.
lead_paragraph: A two-year contract agreement gives the company’s 262 Brooklyn technicians considerable pay raises and ends a three-year standoff between the two sides.

headline.main: Cablevision and Union Reach Brooklyn Contract Deal
headline.print_headline: Cablevision and Union Reach Brooklyn Contract Deal

snippet: A two-year contract agreement gives the company’s 262 Brooklyn technicians considerable pay raises and ends a three-year standoff between the two sides.
